languages.text: The wearer's chances to suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} are reduced by −20%. Base armour property: +15% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} if the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} is more than 70.
